title: Huge connection issue.
body:
Just jumped on leauge. Playing an arams for my first game of the day and boom the whole game, both teams, completely d.c. 
While trying to reconnect it says unable to connect to server and black screens me...

anyone else have this this morning? currently 11.09 am sunday 21/6

replies.body:
Hey Jezman,

Issues like this do happen from time to time, and our team is monitoring 24x7 for any problems with our servers.  We keep an eye out especially for instances like you describe, where disruptions occur for small groups of players when everything else is running smoothly.  Some players do look to use unfair advantages and this occasionally results in issues like you have described.  We've investigated this incident and taken appropriate action.

Thanks for reporting this to us!

Cheers,
Mindstar
